items.content_html: An Employee Management System built as a lightweight application where data is managed using the browser's localStorage as a database. This system provides a simple and effective way to handle employee records without the need for a backend server or external database.
items.title: Ayush4158/Employee-Management-System-ReactJS-Localstorage: An Employee Management System built as a lightweight application where data is managed using the browser's localStorage as a database. This system provides a simple and effective way to handle employee records without the need for a backend server or external database.
